summary:
Today my chawan was finally completed as it had gone through the firing process earlier.
The colors featured are raku red,...
body:
Today my chawan was finally completed as it had gone through the firing process earlier.

The colors featured are raku red, turquoise, white, starry night and cassiopeia. The last two images are there to show you how glazes normally do not always look like the final color, it’s also to be said that I placed three colors next to each other both inside and out. This chawan was made using the Western style of Raku pottery. The pottery is removed from the kiln while it’s bright red hot, then placed into a reduction chamber usually filled with combustible materials which in our case was a tiny hole surrounded by dirt and filled with leafs and a trashcan to be placed and sealed over it, the pottery is then submerged in water about five (5) minutes later and then given time to fully dry and cleaned with soapy water and gentle scrubbing. The reduction process is fun but it’s recommended to have gloves as it’s also very hot and you can definitely be burned by this.

It’s also worth noting that Raku pottery is not something to be used as a common kitchen ware as it is inherently unsafe and can contain lead whether the materials and glaze included lead at all and the firing process also sometimes plays a role in that. You also run the risk of chipping off the glaze and accidentally swallowing it. And despite that the glazes I used are in fact lead free, I will not be consuming anything from this and it will sit as a decorative piece in my home.

summary:
Just realized that i never posted Ainglana here, at least i don’t think i did XD
So Ainglana and Elyra, for those unaware, are...
body:
Just realized that i never posted Ainglana here, at least i don’t think i did XD

So Ainglana and Elyra, for those unaware, are redesigned ocs from my Hysteria webcomic idea that I’m gonna try and redo when i get time. I did some species stuff with the two bust doodles showin off the second jaw above, those aren’t her, same with the leg doodle.

Ainglana is the more serious and responsible older sister of the 2 sister queens who rule the main setting of Hysteria known as New Pangea. New Pangea is sort of a lost/hidden island in the middle of an eternally stormy part of the ocean that hasn’t been explored by those who survived the storm to tell the tale. They were the first mass of land to break off when the original continent of Pangea began to separate so it took all of its native species with it. Creatures, magic, and civilization began forming here earlier than the rest of the world due to the split so it’s like a whole different earth there. They used their technology and magic to hide themselves from the rest of the world when they caught wind of the plagues and wars early humans were causing and wanted no part in it. The storm was created by this, and basically those who survive are stranded on New Pangea and forbidden from leaving since the storm prevents it. They are welcome to live how they please legally in New Pangea though since ya know, they’re technically trapped if they’re an outsider. I’ll write more later on about the sisters and other redesigned characters eventually lol.
